author: bholland.eth
content: If the plan is to move a majority of the network usage from L1 to L2s, via rollups or ZK proofs, since all of the actual execution will be happening on the L2 EVMs, is there a need for L1 to continue to support a full EVM since a majority of what it will be doing is just storing these proofs? (pardon my ignorance)

author: codeknight
content: As I understand, sharding is intended to address this. There will be shards that only support rollups and not the full EVM.
